actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement that students in Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps units be citizens or nationals of the United States.

summary.text: Removes the requirement that students in Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps units be citizens or nationals of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement that students in Junior Reserve Officer Training Corps units be citizens or nationals of the United States.
